summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a potential trip to Bahrain, mentioning 'heavy Iranian input'. The email is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing plans related to Bahrain.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein regarding Bahrain.

keyFacts: The email discusses a trip to Bahrain.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email mentions 'heavy Iranian input' related to the trip.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email contains a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
